question: Which of the following statements is correct about the Ujjwala Plus scheme?
option1: It appeals to economically-well households to voluntarily surrender the LPG subsidy
option2: It aims to protect the rights and interests of the victims of trafficking
option3: It aims to promote the use of solar power among rural households
option4: It seeks to increase the Gross Enrollment Ratio in higher education
answer: It appeals to economically-well households to voluntarily surrender the LPG subsidy
explanation:
Ujjwala scheme was launched to provide free connections to poor households. The “plus” initiative is to boost the original Ujjwala scheme. Under “Ujjwala Plus”, the government appeals to economically-well households to voluntarily surrender the LPG subsidy. The features of the scheme are:
  • The package will allow people to donate cooking gas connections for poor households
  • As per the scheme, donors can pay the cost of the Ujjwala LPG connection to a non-profit company floated by the oil ministry
  • Each connection costs Rs 1,600, donors to get relief under Section 80G of tax norms
